answers.answer: Not enough to count on for contraception.

While I agree with Annie you can also expect the answer is generally yes. As well smoking, poor diet (and uncontrolled diabetes) and a lack of exercise will definitely combine with the diabetes and lead to early erectile disfunction. Tell him he won't have to worry about a low sperm count when he can't even get it up for the job. Ask him how he would like that inevitable outcome if he continues with an uncontrolled lifestyle.

question: My friend is 28 years old & is a type 1 diabetic he has been like this for almost 5 years he takes two different medicines , smokes cigarettes & weed dosen't eat healthy or drink healthy he basically dosent take care of hiself properly could this effect his sperm count?
title: Diabetic Type 1 & low sperm count
